text: wayastaftunaka fi l-nisai quli l-lahu yuf'tikum fihinna wama yut'la 平alaykum fi l-kitabi fi yatama l-nisai allati la tu'tunahunna ma kutiba lahunna watarghabuna an tankihuhunna wal-mus'tad平afina mina l-wil'dani wa-an taqumu lil'yatama bil-qis'ti wama taf平alu min khayrin fa-inna l-laha kana bihi 平aliman
